body_html: For those on Windows, I have just uploaded TF 1.4.0 built against CUDA 8.0.61.2, cuDNN 7.0.4, Python 3.6.3, with AVX support onto my repo. Hopefully this is enough until CUDA 9 gets sorted out on Windows.
body_text: For those on Windows, I have just uploaded TF 1.4.0 built against CUDA 8.0.61.2, cuDNN 7.0.4, Python 3.6.3, with AVX support onto my repo. Hopefully this is enough until CUDA 9 gets sorted out on Windows.
body: For those on Windows, I have just uploaded TF 1.4.0 built against CUDA 8.0.61.2, cuDNN 7.0.4, Python 3.6.3, with AVX support [onto my repo](https://github.com/aluo-x/tensorflow_windows). Hopefully this is enough until CUDA 9 gets sorted out on Windows.
